ygData.subject: Level 11 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t know if anyone said this yet, but this song strikes me as eing awfully similar to the Jedi mind trick. This is what happened to me: I was in Kelethin
ygData.messageBody:
Don't know if anyone said this yet, but this song strikes me as eing
awfully similar to the Jedi mind trick. This is what happened to me:

I was in Kelethin talking to the dwarf who you give bandit tongues to.
He asked if I was a member of 628. I said, "I am a member of 628." He
said, "Sorry friend, but I can't trust you yet..." I sand him a song,
and said, "I am a member of 628." He said, "Then it is my duty to tell
you of the guild tasks." Something like that. Made me laugh anyway...

Mandibal
Bard from Qeynos
Cazic-Thule

----
I have found that the most usefull aspect of the level 11 song is its
ability
to grant the singer quests. Using this song I can attempt or recieve
any good
aligned races/classes quest. I have tried this in several cities and
know that
it is the truth. I try and hail the person, talk a bit and they give a
"once
you are in better standing then we will talk" message. Sing the level
11 song
then repeat the last quest cue. Voila! instant quest. :)
Penaden Songweaver, Vizier of Akalabeth
The Lost Order of Akalabeth
http://www.lostorder.com
